title: Eco Hotels looks to become profitable by next fiscal end; acquires 3 properties
description: Eco Hotels and Resorts Ltd aims to be profitable by March 2026 and has acquired three properties totaling 178 keys. The company plans to achieve a 400-room capacity by October end and targets 5,000 rooms in the next five years, focusing on eco-friendly, zero carbon footprint hospitality.
